title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 332.3 - Attendance of faculty and alumni
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 332.3 - Attendance of faculty and alumni

State Regulations

Councils and, in the case of the State University College
of Environmental Science and Forestry, the board of trustees, shall invite a
representative of the faculty and a representative of the alumni to attend
regular meetings of such bodies. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
332.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
